universal_guidelines.testing: All interactive elements MUST have data-testid attribute (e.g., data-testid='login-btn')
universal_guidelines.motion: NO transition: all. Use specific transitions (transform, opacity, colors).
universal_guidelines.accessibility: Ensure text contrast > 4.5:1. Use 'Outfit' for body text for readability.
universal_guidelines.mobile_first: Design for 360px width first. No horizontal scrolling.
universal_guidelines.admin_security: Admin login is hidden/subtle. Password 'shrujan@2004' is hardcoded in backend, not frontend.

instructions_to_main_agent.step_1: Install dependencies: lucide-react, framer-motion, clsx, tailwind-merge, sonner
instructions_to_main_agent.step_2: Setup Tailwind theme with the colors defined above.
instructions_to_main_agent.step_3: Create the 'Layout' component with the Mobile Bottom Nav.
